TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RowToFieldTransformer extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField
Public NotInheritable Class RowToFieldTransformer Inherits WebPartTransformer Implements IWebPartField

summary.span: 在 Web 部件连接中将数据从实现 接口的提供者转换为需要来自 接口的数据的使用者。

span.span: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the interface to a consumer expecting data through the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器用于将两个连接点不兼容的 Web 部件控件之间的数据转换。Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points. A对象将数据从实现的提供程序转换需要来自数据的使用者的接口接口。A object transforms data from a provider implementing the interface to a consumer requiring data from the interface. 类允许具有这些不兼容的连接点连接的控件。The class allows controls with these incompatible connection points to be connected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象连接提供程序和使用者连接点不兼容。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to connect a provider and consumer with incompatible connection points. 该示例的第一个部分显示提供程序作为服务的 Web 部件控件。The first section of the example shows a Web Parts control that serves as a provider. 名为的提供程序类`RowProviderWebPart`，提供通过数据接口。The provider class, named `RowProviderWebPart`, provides data through the interface. [!code-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/RowProviderWebPart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/RowProviderWebPart.vb#1)] 该示例的第二个部分包含的使用者的 Web 部件连接中的 Web 部件控件。The second section of the example contains a Web Parts control that is a consumer of a Web Parts connection. 名为的使用者类`FieldConsumerWebPart`，需要从数据接口。The consumer class, named `FieldConsumerWebPart`, expects data from the interface. [!code-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/FieldConsumerWebPart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/FieldConsumerWebPart.vb#2)] 该示例的第三个部分显示页面，其中包含两个控件，并定义用于连接两个控件的对象。The third section of the example shows a page that contains the two controls and defines the object for connecting the two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/transformer3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/transformer3.aspx#3)] 代码示例中包含用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。The code example includes a user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 你可以获取该用户控件从.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)，并且它必须放置在与.aspx 页相同的文件夹。You can obtain the .ascx file for the user control from [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0), and it must be placed in the same folder as the .aspx page.

Public Overrides Function CreateConfigurationControl () As Control

summary.span: 在 区域中显示配置 转换器的 ASP.NET 控件。

span.span: Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a transformer in the zone.

returns.span: 配置 的 ASP.NET 控件。

span.span: An ASP.NET control that configures a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态还是动态，则可以建立将 Web 部件连接。A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically. 在中定义静态连接``标记。A static connection is defined within the `` tag. 连接区域包含在网页上，用户是在连接模式下时，用户可以定义的动态连接。A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a web page and the user is in the connect mode. 建立动态连接时，用户定义的连接通过配置控件。When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control. 方法返回用户为了与之交互定义连接的控件。The method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection. 有关配置控件对象允许用户连接或断开连接的提供程序和使用者，并从要连接的使用者的数据字段的提供程序行中选择的字段。The configuration control for a object allows a user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row to connect with the data field of the consumer. 它显示在连接区域中。It is displayed in the connections zone. 将保存，并且加载下一步访问用户的配置设置。The user's configuration settings will be saved, and loaded on the next visit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FieldName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要转换的值的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the value to transform.

value.span: 一个 ，包含要转换的字段的名称。

span.span: A containing the name of the field to transform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示来自将转换为使用者的提供程序行的数据。The property represents the data from the provider row that will be transformed for the consumer. 属性可以设置由用户通过配置控件或一组中以声明方式``标记，其中*selectedField*包含要转换的字段的名称。The property can be set by the user through the configuration control, or set declaratively in the `` tag, where *selectedField* contains the name of the field to transform.

summary.span: 返回字段的值，该字段由接口用作两个 Web 部件控件之间的连接基础。

span.span: Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two Web Parts controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取用于在两个 Web 部件控件之间共享数据的数据字段的架构信息。

span.span: Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two Web Parts controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供的对象，用于转换的类型提供程序数据为类型以便它可由使用者。The method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type to the type so it can be used by the consumer.
